title: Add Simple Mode onboarding UI with progressive disclosure for alerts/templates/models

sections.text: Implement the onboarding UI flow that lets users choose “Simple Mode” and applies the recommended minimal configuration from the backend defaults. In Simple Mode, hide advanced alert/template/model controls behind an “Advanced settings” accordion and show only core workflows (forecasting, next-best-action, risk alerts) with clear, explainable summaries. Ensure users can switch to Advanced Mode later without losing the applied default configuration.
